body.text: - A lot of things can change in twelve years, Admiral. - You enjoyed that. - Earl Grey tea, watercress sandwiches... and Bularian canapés? Are you up for promotion? - When has justice ever been as simple as a rule book? - Our neural pathways have become accustomed to your sensory input patterns. - I'm afraid I still don't understand, sir. - For an android with no feelings, he sure managed to evoke them in others. - Travel time to the nearest starbase? - Wait a minute - you've been declared dead. You can't give orders around here. - Commander William Riker of the Starship Enterprise.
